TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CollectionEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 提供了一个用户界面，可以在设计时编辑大多数类型的集合。

span.span: Provides a user interface that can edit most types of collections at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用要关联的属性。The following code example uses an to associate the with a property. [!code-cpp[EditorAttributesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EditorAttributesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EditorAttributesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

para.span: 此编辑器可以编辑的集合属性。

span.span: This editor can edit collections that have an property.

para.span: 编辑器可以确定从该集合的类型属性，如果它存在。

span.span: The editor can determine the type of the collection from the property, if it exists.

para.span: 如果集合不具有此属性，或如果你想要提供多个类型的集合，则可以重写此类的某些受保护的成员，以自定义编辑器以支持其他类型的集合。

span.span: If the collection does not have this property, or if you want to provide collections of more than one type, you can override certain protected members of this class to customize the editor to support other types of collections.

summary.span: 取消对集合的更改。

span.span: Cancels changes to the collection.

span.span: Override this method if you need to perform additional processing when changes to the collection are canceled.

span.span: The value to remove.

summary.span: 指示是否可以删除原始集合的成员。

span.span: Indicates whether original members of the collection can be removed.

returns.span: 如果允许从集合; 中删除此值否则为。

span.span: if it is permissible to remove this value from the collection; otherwise, .
The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类中实现时，此方法指示是否可以从集合中移除指定的值。When implemented in a derived class, this method indicates whether the specified value can be removed from the collection. 默认情况下，此方法始终返回`true`。By default, this method always returns `true`. 当用户尝试删除的原始成员的集合的项时，调用此方法。This method is called when the user tries to remove an item that is an original member of the collection. 删除在当前编辑会话，因为它们不是但集合的一部分添加的项时，不调用此方法。This method is not called when removing items that were added in the current editing session because they are not yet part of the collection.

span.span: if it multiple collection members can be selected at the same time; otherwise, .
By default, this returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法指示是否可以在集合编辑器对话框中选择多个集合成员。This method indicates whether multiple collection members can be selected within the collection editor dialog box.

protected: virtual Type ^ CreateCollectionItemType();

summary.span: 获取此集合包含的数据类型。

span.span: Gets the data type that this collection contains.

returns.span: 集合中的项的数据类型或如果没有属性可以在集合上找到。

span.span: The data type of the items in the collection, or an if no property can be located on the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以检索从集合中的项的数据类型属性，它是此方法比更快。You can retrieve the data type of the items of the collection from the property, which is faster than this method. 此方法不需要让用户调用，除非在此方法已重写并实现其中的派生类中。This method does not need to be called by users, except in derived classes where this method has been overridden and implemented. 此方法的默认实现返回的数据类型`Item`集合，如果它存在的属性。The default implementation of this method returns the data type of the `Item` property of the collection, if it exists.

para.span: 开发人员可以选择重写此方法以支持不遵循典型和受支持的集合模型中，集合或性能很关键，和基于反射的类型解析太慢。

span.span: Developers can choose to override this method to support collections that do not follow the typical and supported collection model, or when performance is critical, and reflection-based type resolution is too slow.

A new instance of the specified object.

span.span: This method should throw an exception if it cannot create a new instance of the specified type.

span.span: Gets the data types that this collection editor can contain.

returns.span: 此集合可以包含的数据类型的数组。

span.span: An array of data types that this collection can contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以检索从集合中的项的数据类型属性，它是此方法比更快。You can retrieve the data type of the items of the collection from the property, which is faster than this method. 此方法不需要让用户调用，除非在此方法已重写并实现其中的派生类中。This method does not need to be called by users, except in derived classes where this method has been overridden and implemented. 此方法的默认实现返回类型数组中的所有收集项的类型。The default implementation of this method returns the type of all the collection items in a Type array.

para.span: 必须重写此方法以支持具有多个类型的集合。

span.span: This method must be overridden to support collections with multiple types.

para.span: 此方法的默认实现返回的数据类型集合，如果它存在的属性。

span.span: The default implementation of this method returns the data type of the property of the collection, if it exists.

para.span: 使用此方法重写默认实现。

span.span: Use this method to override the default implementation.

summary.span: 获取此集合可以创建的项的可用类型。

span.span: Gets the available types of items that can be created for this collection.
The types of items that can be created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示可以添加到集合的数据类型。This property indicates the data types that can be added to the collection. 默认情况下，这将返回单一类型的。By default, this returns a single type of . 如果返回多个类型，则集合编辑器用户界面提供了一种方法来选择要创建的项目类型。If more than one type is returned, the collection editor UI provides a way to choose which item type to create.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置需要创建一个新的对象，则返回新的对象。If setting requires that a new object be created, the new object is returned. 否则为`editValue`返回参数。Otherwise, the `editValue` parameter is returned.
